subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Four home runs, two of them by Moises Alou, propelled the Mets over the Florida Marlins on Sunday. The Mets had lost four of their previous five games and were in jeopardy of being swept by Florida.
snippet: Four home runs, two of them by Moises Alou, propelled the Mets over the Florida Marlins on Sunday. The Mets had lost four of their previous five games and were in jeopardy of being swept by Florida.
